member_organisations:
1.Celtic Sea herring Advisory Committee 
2. DAFM Quota management Committee 
3.DAFM OPMC
fields_of_interest: Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Food Safety
eu_initiatives: Implementation of Common Fisheries Policy(CFP), Common Organisation of the Markets(CMO). The organisation is in involved in all aspects of the Common fisheries policy and the Common Organisation of the Markets at both local and EU level.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The IFPO works both nationally and Internationally in EU fisheries management for the benefit of our members.
